mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doct_drug_presc_master( id, org_id, patient_id, visit_id, presc_date, presc_no, dispensary, name, name_phonetic, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, presc_type, presc_attr, presc_source, discharge_taking_indicator, binding_presc_title, repetition, count_per_repetition, costs, payments, ordered_by, prescribed_by, entered_by, presc_status, dispensing_provider, usage, decoction, doctor_user, newly_print, verify_by, verified_datetime, diagnosis_name, dispensary_sub, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{prescDate}, #{prescNo}, #{dispensary}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{prescType}, #{prescAttr}, #{prescSource}, #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, #{bindingPrescTitle}, #{repetition}, #{countPerRepetition}, #{costs}, #{payments}, #{orderedBy}, #{prescribedBy}, #{enteredBy}, #{prescStatus}, #{dispensingProvider}, #{usage}, #{decoction}, #{doctorUser}, #{newlyPrint}, #{verifyBy}, #{verifiedDatetime}, #{diagnosisName}, #{dispensarySub}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doct_drug_presc_master SET org_id = #{orgId}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, presc_date = #{prescDate}, presc_no = #{prescNo}, dispensary = #{dispensary}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, presc_type = #{prescType}, presc_attr = #{prescAttr}, presc_source = #{prescSource}, discharge_taking_indicator = #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, binding_presc_title = #{bindingPrescTitle}, repetition = #{repetition}, count_per_repetition = #{countPerRepetition}, costs = #{costs}, payments = #{payments}, ordered_by = #{orderedBy}, prescribed_by = #{prescribedBy}, entered_by = #{enteredBy}, presc_status = #{prescStatus}, dispensing_provider = #{dispensingProvider}, usage = #{usage}, decoction = #{decoction}, doctor_user = #{doctorUser}, newly_print = #{newlyPrint}, verify_by = #{verifyBy}, verified_datetime = #{verifiedDatetime}, diagnosis_name = #{diagnosisName}, dispensary_sub = #{dispensarySub}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT pm.id AS "id", pm.PATIENT_ID AS "patientId", pm.VISIT_ID AS "visitId", pm.NAME AS "name", pm.NAME_PHONETIC AS "namePhonetic", pm.PRESC_DATE AS "prescDate", pm.IDENTITY AS "identity", pm.CHARGE_TYPE AS "chargeType", pm.ORDERED_BY AS "orderedBy", pm.PRESCRIBED_BY AS "prescribedBy", pm.PRESC_ATTR AS "prescAttr", pm.DISPENSARY AS "dispensary", pm.PRESC_SOURCE AS "prescSource", pm.UNIT_IN_CONTRACT AS "unitInContract", pm.PRESC_NO AS "prescNo", pm.PRESC_TYPE AS "prescType", pm.REPETITION AS "repetition", pm.COSTS AS "costs", pm.PAYMENTS AS "payments", pm.ENTERED_BY AS "enteredBy", pm.PRESC_STATUS AS "prescStatus", pm.DISPENSING_PROVIDER AS "dispensingProvider", pm.COUNT_PER_REPETITION AS "countPerRepetition", pm.USAGE AS "usage", ph.BED_NO as "bedNo", nvl(prepayments, 0) - nvl(total_charges, 0) as "prepayment", ph.DIAGNOSIS as "dianosis", pm.BINDING_PRESC_TITLE AS "bindingPrescTitle", pm.DISCHARGE_TAKING_INDICATOR AS "dischargeTakingIndicator", pm.DOCTOR_USER AS "doctorUser", pm.DECOCTION AS "decoction", pm.NEWLY_PRINT AS "newlyPrint", br.BED_LABEL as "bedLabel", pm.DIAGNOSIS_NAME AS "diagnosisName", pm.DISPENSARY_SUB AS "dispensarySub", pm.remarks as "remarks", 0 as "longTerm", 0 as "tempTerm" FROM DOCT_DRUG_PRESC_MASTER pm, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL ph, BED_REC br
pm.del_flag='0'/* and ph.del_flag='0' and br.del_flag='0'*/ and (pm.VISIT_ID = ph.ID) and (ph.WARD_CODE = br.WARD_CODE) and (ph.BED_NO = br.BED_NO) and (pm.PRESC_STATUS not in (2, 3))
and (pm.PATIENT_ID = #{patientId})
order by pm.presc_no desc
